BT.modules.UC.places.UCJoinEdge

Class UCJoinEdgeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.models.CoordinateModel
      • BT.models.LineModel
        • BT.modules.UC.places.UCJoinEdge.UCJoinEdgeController

  • public class UCJoinEdgeController
extends LineModel
    Class for calculating start and end point of join edge between ueCase objects and setting type of line.
    Author:
    Karel Hala

      • drawJoinEdge

        public void drawJoinEdge(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Draw join edge. First check start and end points. Then draw break points. Then draw actual join edge using joinEdge drawer.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics2D to be used to drawing.
